alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Koolau Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 30 at 3:36PM HST until January 01 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR ALL OTHER SHORES IS CANCELLED... .The large north (010-020 deg) swell will continue to subside through tonight. A new large northwest swell (320 deg) will fill in late tonight into Sunday morning, peak Sunday afternoon, then subside into early next week. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Along north facing shores, surf building to 14 to 18 feet late tonight, then 18 to 22 feet Sunday afternoon. Along west facing shores, surf building to 8 to 12 feet late tonight, then 12 to 16 feet Sunday afternoon. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai, and north facing shores of Maui. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
